Class Search

java.lang.Object
  Search

public class Search
extends java.lang.Object

Takes care of traveling to the zone and then searching for the flag once we are in the opponent's zone and capturing once it is found.

Field Summary
 double TILE_DISTANCE

Method Detail

travelToZone

public void travelToZone(int xBottomLeft,
                         int yBottomLeft)
Makes the robot travel to the bottom left corner of the zone.

Parameters:
xBottomLeft - the x coordinate of the bottom left corner of the zone
yBottomLeft - the y coordinate of the bottom left corner of the zone

goForwardX

public void goForwardX()
Helper method for travelToZone. Goes forward x, updates the x tile counter and corrects the odometry.

goForwardY

public void goForwardY()
Helper method for travelToZone. Goes forward y, updates the y tile counter and corrects the odometry.

goBackwardX

public void goBackwardX()
Helper method for travelToZone. Goes backward x, updates the x tile counter and corrects the odometry.

goBackwardY

public void goBackwardY()
Helper method for travelToZone. Goes backward y, updates the y tile counter and corrects the odometry.

isObstacle

public boolean isObstacle()
Checks if there is an object at less than 40 cm.

Returns:
a boolean (true if obstacle, false otherwise)

xReachedMax

public boolean xReachedMax(int xDestination)
Checks if the robot has reached its final x destination.

Parameters:
xDestination - the final x destination.
Returns:
a boolean (true if the final x destination has been reached, false otherwise)

yReachedMax

public boolean yReachedMax(int yDestination)
Checks if the robot has reached its final y destination.

Parameters:
yDestination - the final y destination
Returns:
a boolean (true if the final y destination is reached, false otherwise)

doSearch

public void doSearch(int xBottomLeft,
                     int yBottomLeft,
                     int xTopRight,
                     int yTopRight)
Performs the search once the zone is reached. The robot rotates 360 degrees at each intersection in the zone until it finds the flag.

Parameters:
xBottomLeft -
yBottomLeft -
xTopRight -
yTopRight -

grabFlag

public void grabFlag()
Makes the robot rotate and grab the flag once it is detected.

travelToDropOff

public void travelToDropOff(int xBottomLeft,
                            int yBottomLeft,
                            int xBottomLeftDropOff,
                            int yBottomLeftDropOff)
Makes the robot travel to the drop off zone once it caught the flag. From wherever the robot caught the flag it navigates back to the bottom left corner of the opponent's zone. From there it calls travelToZone to travel to the drop off zone.

Parameters:
xBottomLeft - the x coordinate bottom left corner of the opponent's zone
yBottomLeft - the y coordinate bottom left corner of the opponent's zone
xBottomLeftDropOff - the x coordinate bottom left corner of the drop off zone
yBottomLeftDropOff - the y coordinate bottom left corner of the drop off zone
